ChangeRequest.name: ChangeRequest
ChangeRequest.description: Represents a decision to implement a formal request for a change (RFC).

BusinessJustification.description: A description of the business reason to implement the change. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

BusinessReason.description: The core reason for creating the change request.

Category.description: The type of change request. Administrators set field values.

ChangeRequestNumber.description: The unique, system-generated change request number.

ChangeType.description: The type of change request. Administrators set field values.

Description.description: A description of the change request. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

EstimatedEndTime.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the change request is estimated to be implemented.

EstimatedStartTime.description: The estimated date and time (in UTC) when the change request is implemented.

FinalReviewDateTime.description: The date and time (in UTC) when the change request was reviewed.

FinalReviewNotes.description: Notes left by the change request reviewer. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

Impact.description: Shows the impact of a requested change.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: A polymorphic relationship field that represents the user or group assigned as the change reviewer.

Priority.description: The impact and urgency of a requested change.

RemediationPlan.description: A description of the steps required to resolve the incident. This field can store up to 32 KB of data, but only the first 255 characters display in reports.

ReviewerId.description: The ID of the user who reviewed the change request.

RiskImpactAnalysis.description: An assessment of the risk involved with the implementation of the change request. Administrators set field values, and each value can have up to 20 characters.

RiskLevel.description: The risk level associated with adopting the requested change.

Status.description: Represents any custom or granular stages a customer may want to track. This will be a dependent picklist.

Subject.description: A brief description of the requested change.
